title: Analyze Demographics for a Retail Tenant
description: A national coffee chain is considering leasing a retail space and has asked for a demographic analysis of the surrounding area.

tasks.description: Define a 1, 3, and 5-mile radius around the subject property.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly defines the geographic search areas.

tasks.description: Use a demographic data tool (e.g., Esri) to pull data for those radii, including population, median income, and traffic counts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retrieves the requested demographic data.

tasks.description: Compile the data into a professional report to provide to the prospective tenant.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a clean, well-organized demographic report.
